Ray's expertise is in longitudinal data analysis and advanced statistical computing using `R` and `python`. He completed a Master's in Biostatistics at the **University of Colorado** (Denver, CO) and Bachelor's in Economics from the **University of Pennsylvania - Wharton** (Philadelphia, PA).

His past experience includes data science work in marketing analytics, sportsbetting, medical imaging, and critical care medicine. He is originally from **Philadelphia, PA**, and currently lives in Shadyside (a neighborhood in **Pittsburgh, PA**).

Please reach out using any of the links below, or reach out via email at: raymond.pomponio (at) outlook.com.
